me athara thrikunamala adhikaranaya indiya dhiwarayan this dedenekuta nidahasa laba dena athara thamilnaduwada eyata prathichara lesa thawath shri lankiya dhiwarayan this dedenekuta nidahasa laba dunne ya.me athara pasugiya pahaloswanida derate dhiwara amathyawarun athara sakachcha pawathi athara ehidi thamilnadu prantha rajaya methek pawathi piliwetha ullanghanaya karamin dhiwarayan siragatha kirima waradi bawa shri lankeya dhiwara amathyawaraya indiya dhiwara amathyawarayata pahadili kara dunne ya.
